response.original_title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Road Trip
response.overview: Eleven-year-old Alexander and his family embark on a dream Spring Break vacation to Mexico City only to have all their plans go terribly wrong when they discover a cursed idol.
response.tagline: It's about to become...  a terrible, horrible, no good, very bad road trip.
response.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Road Trip

titles.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Road Trip
